title: Love Me's "Meet Cute"
description:
John Cotrocois is obsessed with meet-cutes, but he always falls for the wrong men. Will his dream of a fairy-tale romance come true?

Season 10 Episode 7
itunes:title: Love Me's "Meet Cute"
itunes:subtitle: John Cotrocois is obsessed with meet-cutes. The problem is, he often falls for the wrong men and winds up in one mind-boggling situation after another. Will his dream of a fairy-tale romance come true? Producers: Mira Burt-Wintonick and Cristal Duhaime S
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
